results.title: [Peter Greenaway interview for Prospero's Books : The Movie Show]
results.brief_description: Margaret Pomeranz, co-host of ‘The Movie Show’, interviews film-maker Peter Greenaway about his film, ‘Prospero’s Books’. Greenaway discusses the origins of the project, working with acting legend Sir John Gielgud and some of the creative processes behind the film.

results.title: [Pathe colour: hand stencil example]
results.brief_description: A segment from an early silent film, illustrating the technique of hand colouration. The film’s captions read “At the castle of Oursel. The dungeon of doom. The dungeon of despair”. No further credits available.
